header.h1: Everyone hates ads.  UnAd is different.

mb0.p1: Every day, we at UnAd help bring untold value to customers by connecting them with the businesses they love.  We do this by providing a simple, easy to use platform that allows businesses to send text messages to their customers.
mb0.p2: The best thing is that as a customer, which business you get messages from is completely up to you.  You can subscribe to as many businesses as you want, and you can unsubscribe at any time.  We will never send you a message from a business you haven't subscribed to.
mb0.p3: Even better, it's completely free! So what are you waiting for?  Sign up today and start getting the best deals from your favorite businesses!

footer.p: Get all the best deals from your favorite businesses in one place.

subscribe.description: Send this link to your customers to subscribe to your business.

qr.description: Share this QR code with your customers to subscribe to your business.

errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to view this page.

footer.p: Grow your business easily with text updates, promos & offerings to all customers at once!

pages/api/register/[phone].otpMessage: UnAd: {otp} is your security code.  Do not share this code with anyone.

errors.otpExpired: Your one time password has expired.
errors.invalidOtp: Your one time password is invalid.

sms.welcome: You will now receive announcements from {name} every time they send one out. You can unsubscribe at any time by replying to any message with the word 'STOP' or 'UNSUBSCRIBE'.
sms.newSub: You just got a new subscriber!  That makes {subCount} so far!

header.h1: Join a community of over {clientCount} businesses and {subCount} subscribers today!
header.mb0: UnAd is the easiest way to connect with your customers through SMS marketing. Say goodbye to complicated marketing tools that require hours of training, and hello to UnAd's user-friendly platform. Get started today and watch your business grow!

footer.p: Grow your business easily with text updates, promos & offerings to all customers at once!

pages/pay/[clientId].title: UnAd - Payment
pages/pay/[clientId].p1: Just one last step and you're done!
pages/pay/[clientId].p2: NOTE: If the list below does not load, <link>refresh</link> this page.

pages/pay/canceled.p: Refer back to your phone to complete the registration process.

pages/pay/success.h3: Your UnAd account is now activated!
pages/pay/success.p: We've texted you a personalized link and QR code to easily build your customer list. Simply share it with your customers and they can sign up for your business easily.

mb2.h3: Remember, now with UnAd you can:

list.0: Send SMS text messages to your customers with ease.
list.2: Reach your customers quickly and effectively.
list.3: Keep your customers engaged and coming back for more.

mb2.h3: Remember, keep an eye out for messages so you don't miss out on any deals!
